channel.title: Gf's Signature Request
channel.description:
i would like my theme to have something related to wealth, or if you could, related to rsps pk
i'd like the text to be : GfServerMaker1 ( a color, any color, that fits with a red/fire looking background )
A smooth texture, something that is very easy, smooth like glass, but not shiny.
i would like the font to be something more fancy, but easily readable, not too " fancy " but something nice.
